Member Function Documentation

◆ run_file()

v8::Local< v8::Value > v8pp::context::run_file ( std::string const &  filename)

Run script file, returns script result or empty handle on failure, use v8::TryCatch around it to find out why. Must be invoked in a v8::HandleScope
